MS 27, 1906  
     618. In grains, fruit, vegetables, and nuts are to be found all the food elements that we need. If we will come to the Lord in simplicity of mind, He will teach us how to prepare wholesome food free from the taint of flesh meat. 
     [IN THE ADEQUATE DIET--483] 
     [IN THE DIET PROVIDED BY GOD--404] 
     [SANITARIUM PATIENTS TO BE TAUGHT TO USE--767]
